SEARCH
Module app.simulator
Package app.simulator.models

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
app.simulator.models.ServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
It is the main class to get the average waiting time for each service point.

  • Field Details

    • queue

      ArrayList<Customer> queue
      Queue for each service point.

    • startTime

      double startTime
      Start time of the service point. It is the time when the first customer arrives to the service point.

    • endTime

      double endTime
      End time of the service point. It is the time when the last customer leaves the service point.
